Token.Abstract: Defines the implementation details of a class expecting to perform actions after the completion of a save operation. (Deprecated: Use KCSAppdataStore methods instead @depreatedIn 1.26.1)
Invoked when a save operation fails (Deprecated: Use KCSAppdataStore methods instead @depreatedIn 1.26.1)

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The Object that was attempting to be saved.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: A detailed description of the error.

Token.Abstract: Invoked when a save operation completes successfully. (Deprecated: Use KCSAppdataStore methods instead @depreatedIn 1.26.1)

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The Object that was attempting to be saved.

Parameter.Name: result
Parameter.Abstract: The result of the operation (NOTE: The value of this result is still changing, do not count on the value yet)
